docs.text:
ElixirBook is an attempt to write a beginner friend book about 
Elixir
 and 
Phoenix
, which I write to better memorize things myself, because I heard that writing about something is the best way to learn and memorize something better.


I am 
Arif Hussain Bangash
, a Geologist turned web developer.


You can find the source code for ElixirBook at GitHub:

ElixirBook
 /

elixirbook.github.io
docs.title: Home

docs.text:
To install Elixir, follow the 
installation guide
 at Elixir's official website.
docs.title: Installation
